item.title: How to setup hugo-apéro on GitHub Pages ...
item.description: TL;DR In this blog, I summarize the steps necessary to adapt the deployment of a Hugo-Apéro website to GitHub Pages. I also discuss how to use git submodules to both shield content and include a theme dynamically. Introduction Hugo-Apéro is a Hugo theme for publishing websites using the blogdown package within R. In fact, it’s what I’m using to publish my peronsal site here! Even if you’ve never used Hugo or blogdown previously, the setup is fairly straightforward.
